item.title: The Week Ahead: Jan. 27-31, 2025 | Washington State House Republicans
item.description: News article "The Week Ahead: Jan. 27-31, 2025 | Washington State House Republicans" from House Republicans.

item.title: 👍Joanne Brasch - California Product Stewardship Council
item.description: Joanne Brasch signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent California Product Stewardship Council.

item.title: 👍💵Heather Trim - Zero Waste Washington
item.description: Heather Trim signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Zero Waste Washington. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Travis Dutton signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State Association of Counties. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Zakiya Cita - The Chayah Movement
item.description: Zakiya Cita signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent The Chayah Movement.

item.description: Andrew Pappas signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent The American Apparel and Footwear Association.

item.description: Brandon Houskeeper signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Northwest Grocery Retail Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Crystal Leatherman signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington Retail Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Peter Godlewski signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent AWB. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Ruth True signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Ravel.

item.title: ❓Peter Lyon - WA State Department of Ecology
item.description: Peter Lyon signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent WA State Department of Ecology.
